articles.author: Lucy Clark
articles.title: Sam Neill: Jurassic Park actor reveals he is being treated for stage-three blood cancer - The Guardian
articles.description: Exclusive: Neill underwent chemotherapy after being diagnosed with angioimmunoblastic T-cell lymphoma
articles.content:
The actor Sam Neill has revealed that he is being treated for stage-three blood cancer in a candid memoir to be released on Tuesday.
In an interview with the Guardian about his book, Did I Ever Tell… [+2584 chars]
